entry.title: My First Blog
entry.content: 这是我的首个个人博客，用于记录自己平常学习与尝试的记录，以便以后重新学习。这篇将记录本人创建Hexo blog的过程。Hello my first blog. I would use it to record any new learning and trying. So in case I forget the process, I can always relearn.This post also record the process of how I create a Hexo blog. SetupInstallationThis blog is created by Hexo.Since my system is window, thus the installation is done by the following: Install the Node.js and npm Install git Install Hexo using the following cmd: 1234npm install hexo-cli -ghexo initcd hexonpm install Next, the Hexo theme can be found in https://hexo.io/themes/And the theme for this blog is NexT https://github.com/theme-next/hexo-theme-next To install NexT, use the following command lines:12cd hexogit clone https://github.com/theme-next/hexo-theme-next themes/next Set the theme: hexo/config _config.yml1theme: next Host local siteGenerating statics html site (source folder) using1hexo generate Then start server using1hexo server Check the local site at http://localhost:4000 Blog at github pageModified the following inhexo/_config.yml123456789url: https://username.github.io/child root: /child/... deploy: type: git repo: https://github.com/username/child.git branch: master Install hexo-deployer-git at root of hexo blog folder:1$ npm install hexo-deployer-git --save Deploy to github page in cmd (Authorize to github account is necessay)123hexo cleanhexo generatehexo deploy Errorsfatal: could not read Username for ‘https://github.com’: No errorupdate Git to version 2.16 or later. Error: remote: Permission to user.github.io.git denied to user.Delete git related “Generic Credintials” underControl Panel\All Control Panel Items\Credential Manager Reference hexo VS jekyll hexo教程系列——hexo安装教程 hexo从零开始到搭建完整 How to use Hexo and deploy to GitHub Pages fatal: could not read Username for ‘https://github.com’: No such file or directory Git’s famous “ERROR: Permission to .git denied to user”
